Service Details: - Helps individuals who have minimal experience in the trades and those wanting to enter the trades, to find employment- Targeted to British Columbians who are unemployed and non-EI eligible, or, who are employed but may lack recognized certification, high school diplomas, or essential skills
Eligibility: Non-EI eligible or employed without recognized certification, high school diploma or essential skills
Major Intersection: Commercial Dr and Rutland Rd N
